game.name: Princess Donuts Shop 2
game.description:
Cooking is something that many girls love to do whenever they find some free time. However, being a kid is hard to take care of this job without the guidance of your parents. If you are a small kid and want to learn how to prepare donuts without making a mess, then trying out Princess Donuts Shop 2 could be a nice bet for you. Apart from getting participated in the donut preparation, you also will also learn how to handle a donut shop. 
Lovers of donuts will keep coming to your shop and your job in this brand new cooking game is to prepare some delicious donuts for your clients. Make sure to use the fruits, toppings and candies to decorate them. You are playing the role of a cute and beautiful princess who wants to try their luck in this business. Prepare and serve every order on time to make their clients believe on her services better! This place is also full of drinks, hamburgers and more items to enjoy. 
Choose the ingredients and decorating items with the help of your mouse or by tapping the screen of your mobile phone in this free HTML5 girls game! Start with the selection of a donut dough, then move to next page and explore other options like cream, additional fruits and creams on the dessert. Choose the side tastes like hamburger, cheesecake or any other dessert items to make it tastier! Serve your food in a good-looking plate combined with a drink! Good luck to play some other popular free girls games online and have fun with your friends, no download required!
